title: A Black Hole That Burps Like a Star Wars Spaceship
summary: Astronomers found a black hole named Jetty McJetface that is doing something surprising. It is burping out bright energy like the Death Star from Star Wars, but much stronger. This happened after a star got too close and was torn apart by the black hole's gravity. At first, scientists didn't see the burps, but years later, the black hole started shining brightly again. They think it might keep getting brighter until 2027. This helps scientists learn that black holes can have delayed burps, which they didn't know before. They are now looking for more black holes that act like Jetty to understand space better.

keywords.explanation: a place in space with very strong gravity that pulls things in
when something lets out energy or material, like a burp from a person
a big spaceship in Star Wars that shoots powerful energy
a funny name for a black hole that burps energy
a big ball of gas in space that shines, like our Sun
scientists who study stars, planets, and space

background_read: Black holes are mysterious objects in space with gravity so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape if it gets too close. Sometimes, when a star comes near, it gets pulled apart, and some material is thrown out as bright energy. Scientists use telescopes to watch these events and learn about how black holes work. This story is about a special black hole that surprised astronomers by burping energy years later, showing that space can have unexpected surprises.
Article_Structure: WHO: Astronomers and a black hole named Jetty McJetface
WHAT: The black hole is burping bright energy after tearing apart a star
WHERE: In space, far away from Earth
WHY: To learn that black holes can have delayed energy bursts, which is new for science

perspectives.description: Scientists are excited because Jetty shows that black holes can have surprising delayed burps, helping them understand space better.
